name: com.castsoftware.datacolumnaccess
title: Data Column Access
description:
The Data Column Access provides support for GDPR policy based on the GDPR indicators. 
The extension is proving support for column's access links with the SQL Analyzer starting version SQL Analyzer 2.4.
In what situation should you install this extension?
- If you need to check that the application is GDPR complaint using the indicators
- If you need to see Access Read and Access Write links
